data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, source sample ID, sample use, and study ID associated with samples obtained from participants with or without chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and involved in the "Genetic Epidemiology of COPD (COPDGene) Funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute" project.

variable.name: source_sampid
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_SNP: SNP genotypes derived from sequence data; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing
